description: Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage - Acquisition of land in Aththaragama, Harispattuwa D/S Division, Kandy District for the construction of Gonigoda Booster Pump house of the Greater Kandy Water Supply Project - Madawala, Harispattuwa D/S Division, Kandy District for the construction Medawala New Service Reservoir and Access Road of the Greater Kandy Water Supply Project - Weragoda, Galigamuwa D/S Division, Kegalle District for the construction of the Main Water Storage Tank and Pump House of Galigamuwa Water Supply Scheme
